2486.verse: لَاهِيَةً|Distracted|88|103|11715$قُلُوبُهُمْ‌ۗ|their hearts.|102|132|1096$وَأَسَرُّواْ|And they conceal|136|166|8191$ٱلنَّجْوَى|the private conversation,|188|218|11489$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$ظَلَمُواْ|[they] wronged,|128|151|558$هَلْ|"Is|50|96|1829$هَـٰذَآ|this|59|105|248$إِلَّا|except|65|111|86$بَشَرٌ|a human being|116|162|2873$مِّثْلُكُمْ‌ۖ|like you?|77|100|9543$أَفَتَأْتُونَ|So would you approach|175|214|11716$ٱلسِّحْرَ|the magic|85|163|955$وَأَنتُمْ|while you|82|160|211$تُبْصِرُونَ|see (it)?"|110|149|11717$

2487.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|80|309$رَبِّى|"My Lord|77|92|2902$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|76|742$ٱلْقَوْلَ|the word|79|94|9359$فِى|in|48|63|89$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the heavens|102|117|157$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۖ|and the earth.|116|131|352$وَهُوَ|And He|67|74|305$ٱلسَّمِيعُ|(is) the All-Hearer,|144|351|1170$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|the All-Knower."|127|334|342$

2492.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|61|293$صَدَقْنَـٰهُمُ|We fulfilled (for) them|165|182|11722$ٱلْوَعْدَ|the promise,|102|119|11723$فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُمْ|and We saved them|152|169|11724$وَمَن|and whom|87|104|1012$نَّشَآءُ|We willed|82|90|5786$وَأَهْلَكْنَا|and We destroyed|141|342|11725$ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ|the transgressors.|141|342|6111$

2493.verse: لَقَدْ|Indeed,|70|87|3466$أَنزَلْنَآ|We (have) sent down|164|199|929$إِلَيْكُمْ|to you|66|101|2453$كِتَـٰبًا|a Book|64|99|3338$فِيهِ|in it|49|84|32$ذِكْرُكُمْ‌ۖ|(is) your mention.|138|155|11726$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|326|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you use reason?|128|349|453$

2484.verse: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.

2485.verse: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play

2486.verse: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"

2487.verse: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."

2488.verse: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."

2489.verse: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?

2490.verse: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.

2491.verse: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].

2492.verse: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.

2493.verse: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
